cleaned_text: The Holistic Parents Guide to Raising Kids in the 21st Century [Dr. Mike Bucknell](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Ir8Xx2tPpNtrik-Uckwbw)Â and can be found on his YouTube channel atÂ [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X8FQo56QHok](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X8FQo56QHok). Due to the quantity of information it has been separated into three parts. Â [Raising Healthy Kids from Conception : Part 1 - Chiropractic, nutrition, SIDS, supplementation,Â Human Placentophagy](https://liberationchiropractic.com/raising-healthy-kids/) [Raising Healthy Kids from Conception : Part 2 - Vaccination](https://liberationchiropractic.com/raising-healthy-kids-conception-part-2-vaccination/) [Raising Healthy Kids from Conception : Part 3 - Circumcision](https://liberationchiropractic.com/raising-healthy-kids-circumcision/) In this workshop, [Dr. Michael Bucknell](https://liberationchiropractic.com/dr-bucknell/) of [Liberation Chiropractic & Wellness in Mobile Alabama](https://liberationchiropractic.com/request-an-appointment/) discusses popular and controversial topics regarding bringing up children healthy in today's environment and culture. Topics include Chiropractic, nutrition, SIDS, supplementation, as well as the highly controversial subjects of Vaccination, Human Placentophagy, and Circumcision. Anyone planning to have children should watch this workshop carefully to make educated decisions that will change the life of their children. ARE THEY DEADLY? REPORTED CASES ACCORDING TO WORLD HEALTH ORGANIZATIONÂ WHAT THE ACTUAL DISEASE AND DEATH RATES TODAY IN DEVELOPED NATIONS? * Of worst disease above Pertussis, collectively risk of infection is currently .00016%, death IF infected .00056?, for total risk to healthy child of .000000088%. (of course they would say thatâ€s all because of vaccination, but review image a few slides back) * According to CDCâ€s VAERS Database there were 25,894 adverse reactions to vaccination reported in 2012 * Of the reported incidence, there are many unanswered questions such as what were the conditions in which the patient was immune compromised, infected, medically TREATED, etc. * Considering what this data suggests, does the risk of vaccination both known and unknown justify the perceived or factual reduction of risk of said disease? * Does that risk/benefit justify the current level of government and special interest involvement and even mandate of vaccination policy? * We are sold that â€herd immunityâ€ (which has never been proven in humans) is justification to forgive your rights, however it is no more your right to worry about what choice others ultimately make as it is for them to make the decision for YOUR child. 3. CAN THEY BE TREATED? IF IN FACT YOUR CHILD WAS INFECTED, WHAT TREATMENTS MEDICALLY AND NATURALLY ARE AVAILABLE?
